BQuiet is an application that makes life easy by its automated muting feature i.e., Silents the device based on time or location.
You have to define specific period of time or location to make the device quiet(silent).

You can create an event in two ways,

One, you can create a time-event by defining the starting and stopping time.

Two, you can just tap on a location in map to create a fence-event.

- Active event will not eat your battery power.

- You can make this app private using 4 digit numeric passcode.

- If you need you can enable SMS for events.

- You can create location based events too.

Bquiet mutes the device on the defined time or by its location.

If you miss a phone call when an event is active Bquiet would send a SMS to the caller if you enabled "Send SMS" field during event creation.

If you enable "Repeat" field during time-event creation then the event will get repeated daily or else the event will die after its execution, however you can restore it from "Bin".

But the fence-event will exist forever, unless you remove the fence. You can't restore a fence-event after deletion.

Note:
- If you change the device ringermode during event execution, will end the event.

- Losing internet connection will terminate the active fence-event.

- Map should be fully zoomed to create a fence.

- Depending on the device's performance it may take few seconds to display the fence-pointer on tapping map.

- Location accuracy depends on GPS, without it location may be inexact by few metres.

- Depending on OS version firing or ending a time-event might be delayed by few seconds.

- Google Play services is mandatory to create Fence-event.

- Rebooting device may troubleshoot any problem associated with Fence-event.

- Modify any of your settings and data.

- Track your location, since we don't have any location tracking / tracing algorithm in our source code. Your location is yours.

- Access / upload any of your data because we don't have any cloud database.
